message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DS

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of synonym conception and proposes a mathematical modeling approach using word vector representation and neural networks. This falls under the sub-category of natural language processing (cs.CL) and machine learning (cs.LG). The use of cosine similarity as a distance measure and the introduction of geometric characteristics suggest a focus on information retrieval (cs.IR) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the experiments conducted using RusVectores resources indicate a possible application in data science (cs.DS).
